title: How is Skarner's passive even going to work on ARAM or Dominion?
body: I'm honestly curious what's going to be done about that,  there aren't any jungle camps or really objectives to place those by.

replies.body: They're placed at different spots on the map. They'll be there; they just don't sit right next to jungle camps (because, as you've noted, there aren't any).

I think they did it to make it so that skarner doesn't lose that much elements(stats) in different maps.  IN WHICH CASE, especially in ARAM riot should buff other champions in those maps as well(aka ww(back to his previous of the devourer-related nerf), Nasus(his q should stack twice as much), and MAYBEE draven(in aram where it's kinda hard to last a long time without dying)).
3v3 doesn't have wards, it's very interesting to see how it's implemented there.

They give him boosts so it boosts his fighting capabilities for that section of the map.

Dominion with Skarner = Double Dominion
